title: The 10 best cycling deals on Amazon Prime Day 2023
content:
Cyclist
The 10 best cycling deals on Amazon Prime Day 2023

Over the next two days, 11th and 12th July 2023, Amazon is knocking huge chunks off the prices of loads of its stuff exclusively for its Prime customers. It’s an endeavour to encourage people to sign up but it’s also an opportunity to bag some excellent deals on an array of stuff, including plenty for cyclists.

We’ve trawled the website for the best stuff for you to bargain hunt some upgrades to your kit list, whether you’re already a Prime customer or as an excuse to sign up and cancel as soon as possible.

If we haven’t located what you are looking for, you can see even more Amazon Cycling Deals here.

1. Garmin Edge 530 Performance GPS Bike Computer

The Garmin Edge 530 includes the Garmin Cycle Map with ‘popularity routing’, meaning you can follow the routes most used by the locals and avoid dead ends, impassable roads and poor surfaces. The Garmin Edge 530 also includes incident detection and compatibility with the Varia rearview radar and lights (see below).

  • RRP: £259.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £179.99

2. Hypervolt Go 2 Massage Gun

If you want a massage gun that you can feel but not hear, this Hypervolt Go 2 featuring QuietGlide technology is for you. It’s cordless, weighs under 1.5lbs (680g), and has a claimed 3 hour battery life. The Hypervolt is a travel-friendly massager (TSA-approved carry-on for US readers) so it can go anywhere with you.

  • RRP: £125
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £98.00

3. Garmin Varia RTL515 Rearview Radar and Tail Light

The Garmin Varia RTL515 Rearview Radar with Tail Light provides awareness of vehicles approaching from behind up to 140m away. When used with your compatible smartphone, the Varia app provides graphics — plus tone and vibration alerts — that indicate approaching cars.

  • RRP: £169.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £139.99

4. POC Omne Air MIPS Bike Helmet

The POC Omne Air MIPS Helmet (read our review) is ideal for commuting and road cycling. This all-purpose bike helmet offers all-round protection for everyday use and is available in a wide range of colours.

  • RRP: £180.75
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £95.98

5. Garmin HRM-Dual Heart Rate Monitor

The Garmin HRM-Dual heart rate chest strap is made of soft material with removable heart rate module. It offers battery life of roughly 3.5 years (with average use of 1 hour per day),

  • RRP: £59.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £44.99

6. Gore Spirit Cycling Jacket

The Gore Spirit men’s cycling jacket is versatile all-weather piece of kit with the cycling-specific cut you’d expect from a premium brand. If you like to be seen, look no further than this highly reflective jacket.

  • RRP: £149.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £71.25

7. Awang 5-25Nm Torque Wrench Set

The Awang Torque Wrench set is made of Cr-V, which is more than strong enough for all bike wrenching requirements. It cover the 5-25Nm range, which takes care of many of the most common components such as stems and seatpost clamps. A great investment that guards against the risk of overtightening bolts and cracking valuable carbon.

  • RRP: £43.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £28.79

8. Bialetti Moka Express Stovetop Coffee Maker

Pre-ride, post-ride or on non-ride days, the unmistakable Bialetti Moka Stovetop Coffee Maker is a taste of Italy. This 9-cup coffee maker with its patented safety valve is suitable for all hobs (except induction hobs).

  • RRP: £59.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £24.99

9. KMC X11SL 11 Speed Chain

The KMC X11SL is a lightweight 11-speed chain that offers great value for money. Available in both silver and gold, the only decision you need to make is how bling you want your bike to look.

  • RRP: £44.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £35.49

10. Vavert 700×18-25c Road Bike Inner Tubes (Pack of 5)

Can you ever have too many spare tubes? For those running truly skinny tyres, these Vavert tubes in a very roadie 18-25mm width. Sold as a set of five tubes, you’re unlikely to find tubes cheaper than these.

  • RRP: £14.69
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £10.99
